description:
4 chambre(s) libre(s) dans une colocation de 4 chambres dans un appartment de 80m2

Situated in the heart of Nice, this beautifully designed apartment offers four cozy bedrooms and two modern bathrooms. The living area is a true haven, featuring chic design elements and a terrace perfect for enjoying lazy afternoons. Each room has been meticulously crafted by our team of architects, showcasing unique color schemes and attention to detail that make this space truly special. With air conditioning throughout, you'll stay cool even on the hottest days. The apartment comes fully furnished with modern appliances, including a large TV, washer, dryer, and dishwasher, ensuring convenience and comfort. Ideal for commuters, it's just a short walk from the train station, and the Alsace Lorraine tram station is only a 5-minute walk away, providing excellent connectivity throughout the city. The rent includes building service charges, bi-monthly professional cleaning of communal areas, internet/cable TV, water, heating, and a provision for electricity, with the final balance adjusted annually or at the end of the tenancy based on actual consumption. A one-time application fee covers the preparation of the lease, check-in and check-out procedures, inventory documentation, and dedicated assistance throughout your stay. The apartment is APL eligible; for a personalized simulation, please visit the CAF website.

description:
5 chambre(s) libre(s) dans une colocation de 5 chambres dans un appartment de 95m2

Experience the charm of this delightful apartment at 70 Rue de France in Nice, just a short two-minute stroll from the iconic Promenade des Anglais and the inviting beach‚Äîperfect for soaking up the sun by the sea. Inside, the apartment offers a comfortable and thoughtfully designed living area with an open kitchen, five cozy bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a practical storage area. Our interior design experts have carefully curated the space, blending contemporary decor with the timeless elegance of traditional French Riviera architecture. Each bedroom features a double bed, ample storage, a desk with a chair for work or leisure, and shelves for your personal touches, creating a welcoming space to relax and unwind. Conveniently located in the heart of Nice, this apartment provides easy access to groceries and public transport, with a supermarket just across the street for effortless shopping. Whether you're stocking up on essentials or setting off on city adventures, everything you need is close at hand. The rent covers building service charges, bi-monthly professional cleaning of communal areas, internet/cable TV, water, and a provision for electricity, with the final balance adjusted based on actual consumption either annually or at the end of the tenancy. A one-time application fee includes the preparation of the lease, check-in and check-out procedures, inventory documentation, and dedicated assistance throughout your stay. The apartment is APL eligible; for a personalized simulation, please visit the CAF website.

description:
This 40 square meter second floor apartment is a great choice for someone who wants a perfect location for their stay in Nice.

The apartment is just 5 minutes away from the beach! A couple of minutes from the main shopping street, lively cafes and restaurants are just on your door step. Facing the Grimaldi square this apartment has a lovely balcony for you to enjoy your breakfast or an afternoon drink.

The Apartment is perfect for two people. There is air conditioning in the apartment.
A great plus to the apartment is a balcony which means that you can sit outside and enjoy great weather.

description:
4 chambre(s) libre(s) dans une colocation de 4 chambres dans un appartment de 95m2

Discover an exquisite four-bedroom apartment in the heart of Nice, where elegant and industrial design elements come together in perfect harmony. This spacious residence offers two sleek, modern bathrooms, a generous living room, and a state-of-the-art kitchen equipped with high-end appliances. Located on the 2nd floor, the apartment is fully furnished and thoughtfully decorated by our interior designers to create a sophisticated and comfortable living space. Situated in the vibrant Centre neighborhood, this apartment is ideally positioned for IPAG students, offering easy access to the university and the bustling city center. The area is rich with shops, restaurants, and the charming Place Garibaldi, providing an array of dining and entertainment options. For added convenience, a supermarket is located just across the street, making grocery shopping effortless. The rent includes building service charges, bi-monthly professional cleaning of communal areas, internet/cable TV, water, and electricity (monthly provision with final balance adjusted annually or at the end of the tenancy based on actual consumption). A one-time application fee covers the preparation of the lease, check-in and check-out procedures, inventory documentation, and dedicated assistance throughout your stay. The apartment is APL eligible; for a personalized simulation, please visit the CAF website.

Rooms come fullyfurnished with a double bed, duvet and pillows, a large wardrobe with bothhanging space and shelves, a bedside lamp, a desk, a chair, and a study lamp.The rooms are equipped with double-glazed windows and reversible airconditioning, ensuring comfort throughout the year. The shared living spaceincludes a cozy lounge with a large HD TV and a fully equipped open kitchen.Appliances include a refrigerator, freezer, oven, microwave, dishwasher,washing machine, toaster, kettle, and coffee maker, making it easy to cook andunwind at home. High-speed internet is also included for seamless connectivity.The rent includes building servicecharges, internet/cable TV, water, heating, and a provision for electricity,with the final balance adjusted annually or at the end of the tenancy based onactual consumption. A one-time application fee covers the preparation of thelease, check-in and check-out procedures, inventory documentation, anddedicated assistance throughout your stay. The apartment is APL eligible; for apersonalized simulation, please visit the CAF website. The VISALE rentalguarantee is accepted.

Hello!

Are you looking for the perfect apartment for your studies in Nice? Look no further! We're offering a fully furnished one-bedroom apartment that was renovated less than a year ago. Your future home is on the 4th floor (no elevator) and features a living room and kitchen, a separate bedroom, a bathroom with a toilet and a window, and a long east-facing terrace to relax and enjoy an evening drink.

The apartment faces the courtyard, so it's very quiet. For your comfort and security, it's equipped with a reinforced, soundproof door.

The kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator, freezer, extractor hood, induction cooktop, oven, plenty of cabinets, pots, pans, a coffee maker, and a washing machine.

In addition to these spaces, the apartment includes a closet for cleaning supplies, an ironing board, and an iron.

You'll also benefit from many amenities and services to make your daily life easier: a TV, internet subscription with fiber optics, Netflix, and reversible air conditioning.

description:
4 chambre(s) libre(s) dans une colocation de 4 chambres dans un appartment de 76m2

A stylish room is available for rent in a beautifully designed apartment on the 5th floor of an Art Deco building. This elegant apartment features four bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a spacious living room with an open kitchen. The contemporary design showcases bright tones and rich textures, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere that feels like home. Each room is fully furnished to a high standard, with a double bed, ample storage, a desk with a chair, and personalized decor. The apartment is equipped with modern amenities, including a fully functional kitchen, a large TV, a washer and dryer, and a dishwasher. Ideal for commuters to Monaco, the apartment is conveniently located near Riquier station. It's also just a 2-minute walk from Carrefour TNL, making shopping a breeze. This apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience, making it a fantastic place to call home in the heart of the city. The rent includes building service charges, bi-monthly professional cleaning of communal areas, internet/cable TV, water, and electricity (with a provision included in the rent and the final balance adjusted annually or at the end of the tenancy based on actual consumption). A one-time application fee covers the preparation of the lease, check-in and check-out procedures, inventory documentation, and dedicated assistance throughout your stay. The apartment is APL eligible; for a personalized simulation, please visit the CAF website.
